attributes.action: Allow NHS staff to wear Dresses as part of their uniform.
attributes.additional_details:
Many women are struggling during the summer months and through medical conditions wearing the thick tunic and trousers.

We would like to have the Dresses reinstated to allow more comfortable working conditions and freedom of choice of what we would like to wear!
attributes.background:
Women are not being treated by the equality procedures/policy. 

NHS staff have had their dresses removed as part the new uniform policy. We would like to reinstate the dresses.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about NHS uniform policy are a matter for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
